title: Demands submitted to director
content:

T+·  T- 

The Tamil Nadu Higher Secondary School Vocational Teachers Kazhagam submitted a petition to the School Education Director highlighting their demands. 

The association demanded that a GO should be issued to consider the consolidate pay work period for grant of pension for vocational teachers, a press release said. 

They wanted vocational education to be made compulsory in all higher secondary schools. It urged the government to immediately fill close to 300 vacancies of vocational teachers that have arisen since 2007, in the State.
